title: New: HAWK – The Hunt
body:
Absolutely adore the recent Daughter album released at the start of this year, and this offering from London’s **HAWK** bares certain similarities.

Also drawing on a Radiohead _In Rainbows_ influence, it’s an exquisitely tender track. Check it below.

Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
